articles.description: Travis Scott's fourth studio album features no discernible smash hits, but his features, including Beyoncé, and Drake, are a highlight.
articles.content: After Kanye West, now known as Ye, dropped his soundscape-bending sixth studio album, "Yeezus," in 2013, he told "The Breakfast Club" that he felt he was "10 years ahead" but "trapped" in the present… [+4102 chars]

articles.title: What's on TV, July 28-30: This Fool, Good Omens - The A.V. Club
articles.description: Gear up for the returns of Good Omens, This Fool, a stellar HBO docuseries, and more
articles.content: Welcome to the weekend edition of Whats On. Here are the big things happening on TV from Friday, July 28, to Sunday, July 30. All times are Eastern. [Note: The weekly Whats On will publish on Sundays… [+3276 chars]
